name: Campaign
author: Infoway LLC

sections.description:
Campaign allows wordpress site to create full campaign and fund making features with registration,login,campaign listing page,campaign details page.user can manage their account as well as user can create the campaign ans set it to live for the site.Campaign details page have the donate options throuh paypal.
Admin view all the campaign and their details and also set the commissions for the campaigner. Also admin have paypal peyment settings mode.
sections.installation:
1.Download the Campaign plugin zip file and extract to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
2.Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress Admin.
3.Place [campaign_funding] or you can put this code <?php echo do_shotcode('[campaign_funding]'); ?> in your templates.
sections.changelog:
1

  • Initial release.

1.1

  • Fixed with WordPress List table error
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

1.Download the Campaign plugin zip file and extract to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
2.Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress Admin.
3.Place [campaign_funding] or you can put this code <?php echo do_shotcode('[campaign_funding]'); ?> in your templates.

short_description: Campaign allow user to manage campaign and funding. donate section for each campaign.
